def max_contiguous_increasing_sum(arr, N):
    current_sum = 1
    max_sum = 0
    arr.append(float('inf'))
    for index in range(N):
        current_sum += arr[index]
        if arr[index] >= arr[index + 1]:
            max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
            current_sum = 0
    max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_contiguous_increasing_sum(arr, N):
    current_sum = -1
    max_sum = 0
    arr.append(float('inf'))
    for index in range(N):
        current_sum += arr[index]
        if arr[index] >= arr[index + 1]:
            max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
            current_sum = 0
    max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum
